text: @realDonaldTrump Don't give a da** . You need to be removed from office before you kill us all. Lil reminder COVID-19 IS STILL HERE AND YET YOU AND YOUR ADMIN ARE DOING NOTHING. PRETENDING IT WENT AWAY WITH THE SUN DOESNY MAKE IT SO. GET A CLUE. #BunkerBoyTrump #25thAmendmentBeforeWeAllDie
